jobsJson.descriptionPlain: Gojek is a Super App. It’s one app for ordering food, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, getting a massage and two dozen services. It is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. In the last 36 months, the startup’s total order volumes has grown to 1100x and diversified into 18 verticals. The company runs the equivalent of three Indian unicorns rolled into one.
jobsJson.description: Gojek is a Super App. It’s one app for ordering food, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, getting a massage and two dozen services. It is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. In the last 36 months, the startup’s total order volumes has grown to 1100x and diversified into 18 verticals. The company runs the equivalent of three Indian unicorns rolled into one.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

lists.content:
• Research, design, test, deploy and maintain high performance Android applications which will be used by Gojek's customer, Gojek partners
  • Giving advice and coaching fellow product engineers
  • Analyzing and maintaining product features defined by product manager
  • Modifying existing software to correct error, to adapt it to new hardware, or to upgrade interfaces and improve performance
  • Analyzing user needs and software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints
  • Overseeing the writing of the program code and ensure the usability and stability of the app
  • Debugging and root cause analysis

• Bachelor degree in computer science, software engineering or any related areas
  • 3+ years in building a robust application using JAVA 
  • Knows perfectly on how to work using GIT
  • Knows a lot about scrum methodology
  • Good communication skill
  • Fluent in English both written and oral
  • Enthusiasm for collaboration with designers, product managers, QA engineers, and other engineers
